channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Does the Big Fed Cut Make Refinancing Worth It?
item.description: Millions can potentially save money by refinancing, but many are waiting for rates to drop further.

item.title: We ranked the latest earnings reports from 30 portfolio stocks from great to ugly
item.description: Our companies' performances were reflective of the S&P 500 firms in aggregate.

item.title: Stocks Slip After Fed Cuts Rates
item.description: The Dow and S&P 500 finished lower after the Federal Reserve voted to cut interest rates by half a percentage point.

item.title: Adobe stock slips on soft fourth-quarter revenue guidance
item.description: Adobe reported third-quarter results on Thursday that beat Wall Street expectations for sales and earnings.

item.title: Get Ready to See Stock Prices in Half-Pennies
item.description: The SEC approved a change to market rules that would cause the prices of many stocks to be quoted in increments of $0.005, which it says will help low...

item.title: Oracle bumps up fiscal 2026 revenue forecast, lifting stock 6%
item.description: Oracle is projecting higher revenue and capital expenditures as its cloud-computing arm grows.

item.title: Where to Put Your Money After the Fed Rate Cut
item.description: What lower rates mean for the trillions of dollars in CDs and high-yield savings accounts.

item.title: These 5 portfolio stocks crushed the volatile market since our August Monthly Meeting
item.description: Investor concerns around the AI boom, coupled with the market's sensitivity to the Fed's next policy move, have caused Wall Street to seesaw in recent...

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Fall in Week Ended Sept. 13
item.description: Commercial crude oil stockpiles excluding the Strategic Petroleum Reserve fell by 1.6 million barrels to 417.5 million barrels in the week ended Sept....

item.title: Oracle shares jump 13% on earnings and revenue beat
item.description: While Oracle becomes more competitive in cloud infrastructure, it is also ensuring that competitors can offer its widely used database to their client...
